sentences.english: Not wishing to disturb his baby sister, he tiptoed into the room.
sentences.chinese: 他不想打擾他的小妹妹，躡手躡腳地走進了屋裏。

sentences.english: My little sister is such a clotheshorse.
sentences.chinese: 我的小妹妹是個特別愛打扮的人。

sentences.english: This time, Liu Yibin and call a few little sister with him.
sentences.chinese: 這次，劉一濱又喚來幾個小妹妹陪他。

sentences.english: I am no stranger to the particulars of your youngest sister's infamous elopement.
sentences.chinese: 別以爲我不知道你那個小妹妹不要臉私奔的事。

sentences.english: My little sister wrote her homework in the study.
sentences.chinese: 我的小妹妹在書房寫作業。

sentences.english: Keep your little sister in. It is too cold outside.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓你的小妹妹出去，外面太冷了。

sentences.english: Susan and I were the only children of our families. So the treated me like a kid sister.
sentences.chinese: 蘇珊和我都是家中的獨女，她帶我像一個小妹妹。

sentences.english: But finally it turned out to be a misunderstanding, Jef only took Carol as his little sister.
sentences.chinese: 結果是一場誤會，傑夫只是把她當成小妹妹。

sentences.english: My little sister called the leaves, now just one and a half.
sentences.chinese: 我的小妹妹叫葉子，如今才一歲半。

sentences.english: Mother made a beautiful skirt for my little sister.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽給我小妹妹做了一條漂亮的裙子。

sentences.english: Today, I was driving my little sister to school.
sentences.chinese: 今天我載着小妹妹去學校。

sentences.english: Tracey3 is still doing movies, still acting, and so is Ashley, who played my little sister.
sentences.chinese: 特雷西3和在劇中演小妹妹的阿什莉都在拍電影。

sentences.english: They saw Ah Fu swimming towards the bank carrying my little sister.
sentences.chinese: 他們看見阿福帶着我的小妹妹遊向岸邊。

sentences.english: Other than one little sister, she has no close relatives.
sentences.chinese: 除了一個小妹妹外，她沒有其它近親屬了。

sentences.english: I have deserted also his little half-sister.
sentences.chinese: 休小時候總愛逗弄她的小妹妹。

sentences.english: Omar and baby sister Fatima at the family home in Jeddah, 1990.
sentences.chinese: 奧馬爾和他的小妹妹在吉達的家中，於1990年。

definition: auntie, youngest of sisters in mother's family
queer uncle, referring to a young to middle-aged male pedophile (Internet slang)
little sister/girl/(Tw) young female employee working in a low-level role dealing with the public (assistant, waitress, attendant etc)
maternal aunt/step-mother/childcare worker/nursemaid/woman of similar age to one's parents (term of address used by child)/CL:個|个[ge4]
erhua variant of 女孩[nu:3 hai2]
mythological daughter of Fiery Emperor 炎帝[Yan2 di4] who turned into bird Jingwei 精衛|精卫[Jing1 wei4] after drowning
